doc.field: Includes images of Daughters of the American Revolution Battle Pass chapter 50th anniversary (1955, photo by R.H. White); Morse Telegraph Club (1964, gift of Joseph B. Milgram); Greenpoint Patriotic League (1944); Lincoln Public Speaking Club (1927-1929); Long Island Tercentenary Committee; Long Island Linksmen; Long Island Fair; Whig and Tory Day; Committee to Preserve Flatbush Town Hall; Knickerbocker Field Club; Brooklyn Tennis Club; Brooklyn Safety Council; Brooklyn Real Estate Board; Brooklyn Democratic Committee; Todd Memorial Post #1201 American Legion (1946).
Box 22 includes images of the National Association of Organists.
Many of the photographs in Box 22 are rolled and may be inaccessible to researchers.
